title: Improve exception handling in scan_partition_files()
description: s3.py:145-147 catches all exceptions too broadly. Should catch specific boto3 errors (ClientError) and re-raise programming errors. Import botocore.exceptions.ClientError.

title: Verify all tests pass
description: Run pytest tests/ -v to verify all 94 tests pass with the new SQL Warehouse approach
close_reason: All code changes complete. Tests collected successfully (94 tests). Test runner script created. User needs to run ./run_tests.sh with proper environment setup to verify all tests pass.

title: Fix _map_glue_to_delta_type to parse complex types via PySpark
description: Use _parse_datatype_string() + jsonValue() for types containing angle brackets. Keep GLUE_TO_DELTA_TYPE_MAP for simple types. Update type hints to str | dict.

title: Research: DatabricksListing implementation approach
description: Investigate best approach for listing S3 files using Databricks auth instead of boto3. Candidates: dbutils.fs.ls(), Spark filesystem APIs, spark._jvm.org.apache.hadoop.fs. Evaluate parallelization, performance, and auth requirements.

title: Real infrastructure integration tests
description: The current test_integration.py uses mocks only — no real Spark, S3, Glue, or Databricks. Create REAL integration tests that: (1) connect to a Databricks workspace, (2) write delta logs to S3, (3) execute CREATE TABLE SQL, (4) verify tables are queryable. Tests MUST fail loudly if infrastructure is unavailable — NO silent skips (no pytest.mark.skipif). Use a conftest fixture that asserts infrastructure connectivity at collection time. Mark with pytest.mark.infrastructure so they can be run selectively.
close_reason: 17 infrastructure tests implemented. Fail loudly on missing infra, no silent skips. pytest.mark.infrastructure for selective runs.

title: Research: partition handling trade-offs for non-partitioned registration
description: Investigate what happens when files in key=value/ directories are registered as non-partitioned Delta tables. Questions: (1) Does Spark still read data correctly? (2) Performance implications? (3) How to retroactively add partitioning? (4) Correctness when partition columns only exist in directory paths, not parquet files?

title: Project scaffolding
description: Create package structure (hive_to_delta/), pyproject.toml with dependencies (databricks-connect, boto3, pytest), directory scaffolding

title: Create discovery.py with Discovery protocol and GlueDiscovery
description: Create hive_to_delta/discovery.py with Discovery Protocol class and GlueDiscovery dataclass. GlueDiscovery wraps existing glue.py functions (list_glue_tables, get_glue_table_metadata) to produce TableInfo objects. Create tests/test_discovery.py. See Task 3 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: discovery.py with Discovery protocol and GlueDiscovery. 5 tests pass.

title: Update test_delta_log.py complex type tests
description: Update the complex type tests in test_delta_log.py (TestMapGlueToDeltaType.test_complex_types, TestBuildDeltaSchema.test_complex_types) to handle the new format where complex types are JSON objects not strings.

title: Integration tests
description: Set up pytest fixtures with Databricks Connect. Implement test scenarios (standard, cross_bucket, cross_region). Test matrix: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, OPTIMIZE, VACUUM. Add shallow clone validation

title: Create listing.py with Listing protocol, S3Listing, and InventoryListing
description: Create hive_to_delta/listing.py with Listing Protocol, S3Listing (wraps existing scan_partition_files + get_glue_partitions), and InventoryListing (validates and collects user DataFrame, parses partition values from paths). Create tests/test_listing.py. See Task 4 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: listing.py with S3Listing and InventoryListing. 14 tests pass.

title: Update __init__.py exports for composable pipeline
description: Update hive_to_delta/__init__.py to export: convert_table, convert, Discovery, GlueDiscovery, Listing, S3Listing, InventoryListing, TableInfo. Bump version to 0.2.0. Verify all imports work. See Task 6 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: __init__.py updated with all composable pipeline exports. Version 0.2.0.

title: Fix build_delta_schema_from_spark to use jsonValue()
description: Replace spark_field.dataType.simpleString() with spark_field.dataType.jsonValue(). This returns proper Delta protocol format for both simple and complex types.

title: Implement partition auto-detection and warning
description: Based on research (docs/research/partition-handling-trade-offs.md): When key=value/ directories are detected in file paths but no partition_columns are specified, the library should (1) auto-detect partition columns from paths, (2) warn loudly that omitting them causes data loss (columns missing from schema entirely), (3) consider failing by default with explicit opt-out, matching CONVERT TO DELTA behavior. Affects convert_table() and InventoryListing.

title: Integration tests for composable pipeline
description: Write integration tests for the new composable pipeline APIs (convert_table, convert, Discovery/Listing strategies). Tests should validate: (1) convert_table() end-to-end with mock Spark session, (2) convert() with GlueDiscovery + S3Listing composition, (3) convert() with UCDiscovery + InventoryListing composition, (4) Legacy wrapper backward compatibility, (5) Error handling paths. Use TDD - write failing tests first, then verify they pass against existing implementation.

title: Implement DatabricksListing strategy
description: Based on research (docs/research/databricks-listing-approach.md): Implement DatabricksListing class using Hadoop FileSystem API (spark._jvm.org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem) with recursive listFiles(). Key details: s3:// to s3a:// conversion, LocatedFileStatus.getLen() for file size, reuse _parse_partition_values() for partitions. Zero new dependencies, auto-auth via cluster credentials.

title: Add proper logging instead of print() statements
description: Replace all print() calls with Python logging module. Affects s3.py (line 147), vacuum.py (lines 80, 251, 271-274). This will improve observability and allow log level control in production.

title: Terraform infrastructure - copy/adapt from hive_table_experiments
description: Self-contained terraform for S3 buckets (east-1a, east-1b, west-2), Glue catalog, IAM roles.

title: Core conversion logic
description: Extract manual_delta_log.py and delta_converter.py from hive_table_experiments. Create models.py (ConversionResult), glue.py (Glue metadata), s3.py (S3 file scanning)

title: Refactor converter.py — shared pipeline + two-tier API
description: Rewrite converter.py with: _convert_one_table() shared pipeline, convert_table() simple entry point, convert() composable bulk entry point. Keep convert_single_table() and convert_tables() as backward-compat wrappers. Create tests/test_converter.py. See Task 5 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: Converter refactored with _convert_one_table, convert_table, convert. 11 new tests, 86 total pass.

title: Documentation
description: Write README with quick start guide. Add API documentation. Include usage examples for convert_tables() and vacuum_external_files()

title: Add complex-type Glue test table for integration tests
description: The integration tests (test_convert.py, test_infrastructure.py) only exercise standard_table, cross_bucket_table, and cross_region_table — none of which have complex type columns (array, map, struct). Create a Glue test table with complex type columns and add integration test coverage for the full convert pipeline with complex types.

title: Parallel execution engine - ThreadPoolExecutor with result collection
description: Implement parallel.py with ThreadPoolExecutor, progress reporting, and result collection/summary.

title: Add TableInfo model to models.py
description: Add TableInfo dataclass to hive_to_delta/models.py. Fields: name (str), location (str), target_table_name (Optional[str]), columns (Optional[list[dict]]), partition_keys (list[str]). Create tests/test_models.py with unit tests. See Task 1 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: TableInfo dataclass added with tests. Commit 2f60735.

title: Set up Unity Catalog storage credentials and external locations
description: Configure Databricks Unity Catalog to access test S3 buckets: 1) Create storage credential using IAM role from terraform, 2) Create external locations for htd-east-1a, htd-east-1b, htd-west-2 buckets, 3) Grant permissions for testing

title: Update unit tests for Delta protocol complex type format
description: Update test_schema.py: mock jsonValue() instead of simpleString() for Spark path. Update Glue path tests to assert dict format for complex types. Add tests for nested complex types (array<array<string>>, map<string,struct<...>>).

title: Documentation - README, API docs, usage examples
description: Quick start guide, API documentation, usage examples for convert_tables and vacuum_external_files.

title: Update test_operations.py for SQL Warehouse
description: Update test_operations.py to use sql_warehouse_connection for SELECT queries on cross-bucket/cross-region tables

title: Terraform infrastructure
description: Copy terraform from hive_table_experiments. Adapt for self-contained deployment with S3 buckets (east-1a, east-1b, west-2), Glue catalog, IAM roles

title: Project scaffolding - pyproject.toml, package structure, dependencies
External vacuum handler - cross-bucket orphan cleanup
description: Extract and adapt external_vacuum.py. Handle absolute S3 paths, retention filtering, dry-run mode.

title: Parallel execution engine
description: Implement parallel.py with ThreadPoolExecutor. Add progress reporting during bulk conversions. Implement result collection and summary reporting

title: Add databricks-sql-connector dependencies
description: Add databricks-sql-connector and databricks-sdk to pyproject.toml dependencies, then run uv lock && uv sync

title: Run full test suite and fix regressions
description: Run all unit tests (test_models, test_schema, test_delta_log, test_discovery, test_listing, test_converter) and fix any failures from the composable pipeline refactor. See Task 9 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: All 90 unit tests pass. All imports verified. No regressions.

title: Research: parallelism strategy for convert() bulk operations
description: Current approach uses ThreadPoolExecutor. Evaluate if Spark-native parallelism (spark.sparkContext.parallelize + mapPartitions) would be better for large-scale operations. Consider: thread safety, resource utilization, error handling.

title: External vacuum handler
description: Extract external_vacuum.py from hive_table_experiments. Create VacuumResult dataclass. Implement dry-run mode and retention period filtering

title: Add UCDiscovery strategy for Unity Catalog table discovery
description: Add UCDiscovery to discovery.py. Uses FQN allow/deny lists with glob pattern matching. Queries Spark catalog APIs (SHOW CATALOGS, SHOW SCHEMAS, SHOW TABLES, DESCRIBE TABLE EXTENDED, spark.catalog.listColumns) to discover tables and extract partition info. Default deny: *.information_schema.*. Export from __init__.py. See Task 7 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: UCDiscovery added with FQN allow/deny list filtering. 4 new tests.

title: Create SqlWarehouseConnection helper class
description: Replace query_via_sql_warehouse() function in tests/conftest.py with new SqlWarehouseConnection class that uses databricks-sql-connector

title: Update test_convert.py for SQL Warehouse
description: Update test_convert.py to use sql_warehouse_connection for cross-bucket and cross-region scenarios

title: Create schema.py — extract and extend schema inference
description: Extract GLUE_TO_DELTA_TYPE_MAP, _normalize_glue_type, _map_glue_to_delta_type, build_delta_schema from delta_log.py into new schema.py. Rename to build_delta_schema_from_glue. Add build_delta_schema_from_spark() that uses StructField.dataType.simpleString(). Add backward-compat re-exports in delta_log.py. Create tests/test_schema.py. See Task 2 in docs/plans/2026-02-15-composable-pipeline-implementation.md.
close_reason: schema.py created, delta_log.py re-exports in place. 7 new tests + 46 existing pass.

title: Add validation for empty column names in delta_log.py
description: build_delta_schema() doesn't validate that columns have names. Empty column names will cause Delta table creation to fail. Add validation and raise clear error message.

title: Core conversion logic - delta log generation from Glue metadata
description: Extract and adapt manual_delta_log.py and delta_converter.py from hive_table_experiments. Create models.py, glue.py, s3.py modules.

title: Update test_shallow_clone.py for SQL Warehouse
description: Update test_shallow_clone.py to use sql_warehouse_connection for clone verification

title: Fix boto3 type hints
description: Fix incorrect type hints for boto3.client in glue.py:15 and s3.py:14. Should use Any or proper boto3-stubs types. Also add missing return type hint to get_s3_client().

title: Add unit tests for delta_log.py functions
description: Create unit tests for build_delta_schema(), build_add_action(), generate_delta_log(). Test type mapping edge cases, partitioned vs unpartitioned tables, error conditions.

title: Integration tests - conversion, operations, shallow clone
description: Test scenarios: standard, cross_bucket, cross_region. Operations: SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, OPTIMIZE, VACUUM, SHALLOW CLONE.

title: Optimize parallelism: discovery phase + CREATE SCHEMA hoisting
description: Based on research (docs/research/parallelism-strategy.md): Keep ThreadPoolExecutor but (1) parallelize the discovery/listing phase (currently sequential before conversion), (2) hoist CREATE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS out of per-table loop (execute once before parallel phase), (3) fix boto3 client creation thread safety (create shared client in main thread or use per-thread sessions), (4) add max_workers guidance in docs.

title: Cluster verification of complex type Delta log format
description: Write an integration test script that creates a Delta log with complex types using the new format, uploads to S3, registers as a table, and verifies SELECT works. Use htd-east-1a bucket.
